Journal.Title: Comptes rendus des seances de la Societe de biologie et de ses filiales
Journal.ISOAbbreviation: C R Seances Soc Biol Fil

Article.ArticleTitle: [Cytotoxicity of cadmium : study on root meristems of Allium sativum L].

AbstractText: Cadmium nitrate, acetate and sulphate cause death of root meristems of Allium sativum at 5.10(-7) Mol/ml concentration for the two first ones and 10(-7) Mol/ml for the last one. Lower concentrations do not induce chromosomal aberrations. As to the cellular toxicity, cadmium salts are between phenyl-mercuric-hydroxid and lead nitrate, the first one being the most active.

Article.VernacularTitle: Cytotoxicité du cadmium: étude sur les méristémes radicularies d'Allium sativum L.
